address-change-cooldown-message: Please wait at least 15 min before requesting another address change.
apply-kyc-level-one-sucess: Thank you - Your info was submitted for KYC Level 1 and is currently under review.
client-seed-changed-desc: Seed pair has been rotated using your client seed.
code-unusable-message: Unfortunately this promo is no longer available :(
error: Beep boop - There was an Error
exchange-success-message: Your exchange has been processed and is now available in your wallet.
failed-bet-limbo: Uh oh, looks like there was an issue - Try again.
failed-change-address: Address refresh failed, please try again.
failed-get-wallet-address: Failed to sync wallet addresses, please refresh the page.
failed-merged-account: Failed Merging Accounts - Try again or contact support
failed-reset-password: There was an issue resetting your password, please try again.
incognito-mode-off-desc: Your profile and bets are publicly viewable.
incognito-mode-on-desc: Your profile and bets are hidden from view.
no-system-notifications: There's not much to see here at the moment - Come back later
no-user-notifications: There's not much to see here at the moment - Come back later
nominate-thank: Success! Every bet you place will be matched with a donated portion of the wagered amount.
promotion-join-success: You have successfully joined the promo.
region-block: Oh no, it looks like our site isn't available in your region due to local restrictions :(
tip-pending-email-confirmation-code: Check your email for a 6-digit confirmation code.
two-fa-check-email: Please check your email and confirm to activate 2FA on your account.
update-btc-deposit-address-confirmation: Are you sure you want to refresh your BTC deposit address? This cannot be undone - deposits to the old address won't be credited.
withdrawal-pending-email-confirmation-co: Withdrawal Pending - Check your email for a 6-digit confirmation code.
your-account-signed-out: Logout Success - Have a wonderful day!
